TrafficStop.Initiate: T: Turn on your sirens to {{initiate(initiate)}} the traffic stop.
TrafficStop.WaitUntilStop: T: Wait until the vehicle has come to a stop, then proceed with the traffic stop.
TrafficStop.Proceed: T: The vehicle has stopped. Proceed with the traffic stop.
TrafficStop.Canceled: T: You've canceled the traffic stop.

ErrorLocalizations.MultipleMenusWithSameKey: T: There are multiple menus which key is set to {{key}}. Make sure to change them, otherwise they will not work.

WarningLocalizations.ConfigException: T: An error occured while parsing the {{path}} file, the default values will be used. Make sure that the JSON formatting is correct, we recommend using the following site to check it: https://jsonformatter.org/
WarningLocalizations.EmptyConfigException: T: The {{path}} file is empty, the default values will be used.
